references.paper_title: Blended diffusion for text-driven editing of natural images
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its introduction of a novel method for text-driven image editing, a central theme of the presented research.

references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This is a foundational paper for instruction-based image editing, directly addressing the core methodology explored in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Laion-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: As a large-scale dataset, Laion-5B is crucial for training image-to-image models, forming a basis for the techniques used in the discussed paper.

references.paper_title: GLIDE: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: GLIDE's approach to text-guided image generation and editing is a significant contribution directly relevant to the methods used in the current research.

references.paper_title: Unpaired image-to-image translation using cycle-consistent adversarial networks
references.reason: This is a seminal work in image-to-image translation, providing a foundation upon which many subsequent techniques, including those referenced in this paper, are built.
